name: Boozy Berry Parfait
description: A simple parfait combining good-natured Greek yogurt and granola with some sweet booze-soaked berries.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup bourbon (or whichever dark liquor you prefer)
2 cups Greek yogurt (plain or vanilla works best)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl combine strawberries, blueberries and/or blackberries, bourbon, and sugar, and gently toss with a spoon. Let sit on the counter until berries begin to release their juices, 8 to 10 minutes.
Place berries in the bottom of a wineglass (or other pretty clear dish) followed by yogurt and the granola. Repeat in each glass, layering each parfait with a total of 6 layers. Serve immediately.
